---
title: Create and edit files
contexts: office365,microsoft365
source: Microsoft public sites
translation: en
tools: yammer
---

If you need to create a new file in Word, PowerPoint, or Excel, you can add one right in Yammer\.

__Create a file__

From your Yammer home page:

1. Select __Create a File__\.
2. Select the dropdown arrow and select the file type you want\.
3. Type in a file name, and select __Create__\.

The new file opens in another tab, and also appears in a __Files__ list that all group members can access\.

__Create a new document__

1. In the right rail below Group Actions, click on __\+ Create a File\.__
2. Select __Word Document__, __PowerPoint Presentation__, or __Excel Workbook__ from the pull\-down menu and give your new file a name\.
3. Click __Create__\.

![Create a file](data:image/png;base64,)

__Edit a file__

From the __Files__ list in your Yammer group:

1. Select the file you'd like to modify\.
2. Select __Edit File__\.

[https://www\.microsoft\.com/en\-us/videoplayer/embed/7bcdcb5e\-bcc8\-4d36\-b5a7\-b1cd5ca07e16?autoplay=false](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/videoplayer/embed/7bcdcb5e-bcc8-4d36-b5a7-b1cd5ca07e16?autoplay=false)
